author: Victoria Colliver and Katy Murphy
title: How California disasters helped the state respond to coronavirus
description: California's perpetual state of disaster response — be it fires, floods or earthquakes — has forced state and local governments to prepare.
content:
Embers falls from burning palms and the sun is obscured by smoke as flames close in on a house at the Woolsey Fire. | Getty Images
SACRAMENTO The deadly wildfires that swept through California with increasing ferocity in recent years delivered brutal lessons… [+5816 chars]
